sentence.Network_en: A little mustard is served on the side to add further piquancy.

sentence.Network_en: The tart flavour of the cranberries adds piquancy.

entry.def: Food that is piquant has a pleasantly spicy taste.

example.ex: ...a crisp mixed salad with an unusually piquant dressing.
example.tran: 浇上特别辛辣的调料的脆口什锦色拉

entry.tran: 引人入胜的；刺激有趣的
entry.def: Something that is piquant is interesting and exciting.

example.ex: There may well have been a piquant novelty about her books when they came out.
example.tran: 她的书问世时可能确有引人入胜的新颖之处。
